Pricing

No Plans.

Buy what you need

1 credit = 1 survey

Your credits never expire

  • Credit Packs

  • 1000 credits = $10
  • 5000 credits = $40
  • 10000 credits = $70
  • 25000 credits = $150
  • 50000 credits = $250

Pricing FAQ

What types of payment do you accept?
Credit cards including MasterCard, Visa or American Express.
Do I have to buy credits before sending surveys?
Yes. Credits are pre-paid.
What happens when I run out of credits?
You can buy additional credits from account section. You can also setup auto-renew to automatically refill credits when they run out.
Questions?
Contact us for any further questions at support@booleanapp.com.
